= Commands =

== Find and Replace Text ==

```:%s/search/replacement/g```

* search - the word that you are trying to replace
* replacement - the new word


= Bindings =
:map <c-s> means ctrl + s
`:Files<CR>`:: Write the command and enter



== Useful Bindings ==
`gd`:: Go to definition
`F2`:: rename
`K`:: show tooltip
`c-k`:: Show information on the given word
`gf`:: Go to file
`:Files<CR>`::
:: Press `<C-x>` for horizontal split
:: Press `<C-v>` for vertical split
